tool.name: Convert to Hapmap
tool.description: Convert 1K RiCA Agriplex or DArT genotyping data to hapmap

param.name: input_type
param.label: Select genotype data format
param.help: currently accepts: 1K RiCA or DArT tabular data

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
** Convert to Hapmap - what it does**
This tool converts genotype data from 1kRiCA (AgriPlex) or DaRT into HapMap format.
- **1kRiCA (AgriPlex)**: Requires an Excel file (.xlsx). - **DaRT**: Requires a CSV file (.csv).
**Output Format:** A HapMap-formatted TSV file.
